channel.title: [[ 317 Team ]] - The New Era
channel.description:
[ul][B][CENTER][SIZE="2"]Hello there, I'm going to make this as short as possible since I will edit and make this thread prettier later. My name is Chris according to my username and I've had some highs and alot of lows on this site. I've been away for months inactive and abandonded this account and anything video game related due to the fact of me being scammed. I used to code Rsps, and habbo retros for the fun and joy of seeing others on my server. I had a very healthy server with new members coming by the dozens and a beautiful site created by me. I had to close the server due to the inefficient funds I had. After that I went solo on RuneScape I ended up having over 900m Wealth in just three weeks. Untill I was scammed by Gold4Rs,and I had efficient evidance yet they got away with it and unscaved. Enough about me lets move on.
The New Era I'm looking to create a RSPS, I'm looking for a joyful project where everyone can contribute ideas. The name might be changed, depending on what we choose it to be. We must work together via windows live messenger via group chat or dropbox The base will be a very optimized delta source, with no dead fragments of code.
- Some Credentials - Fluent in Java Some PHP Knowledge Some Mysql Knowledge Great with Forums & Maintaining sites
Things I can do, Vote4cash, Webclient, Forum, Some web-designing, Programming, & Some Graphics
Goals of what I would like us to achieve:
[list] [*]- Perfect Pking
[*]- Perfect Timing on Spells
[*]- Flawless Emotions
[*]- HD resizable Client
[*]- Dos & DDos Proof
[*]- Anti Client Hack
[*]- New 474 Models
[*]- Flawless Combat
[*]- Clickable quest tab commands
[*]- Castle Wars ( Optional )
[*]- Vesta ( Optional )
[*]- Morrigans ( Optional )
[*]- Chaotic ( Optional )
[*]- Shops
[*]- Kbd
[*]- Some Quest Tab Commands
[*]- Custom Mini Games
[*]- Pk Point Shop
[*]- Pk Point System
[*]- Titles depending on the amount of kills
[*]- In Game hiscores
[*]- Small Tutorial
[*]- Many other things! [/list]
[U]Reasons to join [/U]
[LIST=1]
[*]Looking to be the top 317 Rsps server out there
[*]Joyful team that can work together
[*]Will be a successful server
[*]Much more...[/ul]
[QUOTE]Application for the team
Age:
Position:
Timezone:
Experience:
Experienced in: ( Name it/them:
Why you would like to join:
Can you contribute to the team as in payments for hosting, vps:
Other:
[/QUOTE]
- Unfinished -[/SIZE][/CENTER][/B]

[ul][B][CENTER][SIZE=“2”]Hello there, I’m going to make this as short as possible since I will edit and make this thread prettier later.
My name is Chris according to my username and I’ve had some highs and alot of lows on this site. I’ve been away for months inactive and abandonded this account and anything video game related due to the fact of me being scammed. I used to code Rsps, and habbo retros for the fun and joy of seeing others on my server. I had a very healthy server with new members coming by the dozens and a beautiful site created by me.
